CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that ignored document.write() called from an external asynchronously loaded script is reported to console as a warning

external-script-with-document-write.js:2 Failed to execute 'write' on 'Document': It isn't possible to write into a document from an asynchronously-loaded external script unless it is explicitly opened.
(anonymous) @ external-script-with-document-write.js:2
